parameters.query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.name,
  p.description,
  p.price,
  p.original_price,
  p.images,
  p.colors,
  p.sizes,
  p.tags,
  p.materials,
  p.product_code,
  b.name as brand_name,
  c.name as category_name
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN brands b ON p.brand_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id
WHERE 
  p.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
  OR p.description ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
  OR p.tags::text ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
  {% if $json.searchQuery.colors.length > 0 %}
  OR p.colors::text ILIKE ANY(ARRAY[{% for color in $json.searchQuery.colors %}'%{{ color }}%'{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}])
  {% endif %}
  {% if $json.searchQuery.category != 'general' %}
  OR c.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.category }}%'
  {% endif %}
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN p.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%' THEN 1
    WHEN p.description ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%' THEN 2
    ELSE 3
  END,
  p.created_at DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.maxResults || 20 }};
